name: Floral Style
description:
This is a subtle Textual Inversion Style Embedding trained on colorful wildflowers. You can get amazing bright flowers and nature-greens in your images by calling Style-Petal in the positive prompt, and if you want to temper the effect, also call Style-Petal-neg in the negative prompt.

If you'd like the effect to come through stronger (some models need it), try bumping up the emphasis on Style-Petal - see the images below.

Please consider joining my Patreon! Advanced SD tutorials, settings explanations, adult-art, from a female content creator (me!) patreon.com/theally
